TLCConcept.showAs: The Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) (Amendment) Regulations 2022

formula.name: enactingText
formula.p:
The Secretary of State makes the following Regulations in exercise of the powers conferred by section 41(1), (2)(a) and (5) of the Road Traffic Act 1988 (the “1988 Act”)
1988 c. 52; section 41 was amended by the Scotland Act 2016 (c. 11), Part 4, section 43, the Road Traffic Act 2006 (c. 49), sections 18(1) and 56, and the Road Traffic Act 1991 (c. 40), Schedule 4, paragraph 50 and Schedule 8..
Representative organisations have been consulted in accordance with section 195(2) of the 1988 Act.

content.p: These bold Regulations may be italic cited as the underlined Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
These Regulations bold and underlined and italic come into force on 14th February 2022.
These Regulationssuper script extendsub script to England and Wales and Scotland.

article.heading: Amendment of the Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) Regulations 1986

content.p:

S.I. 1986/1078, relevant amending instruments: S.I. 1990/317, S.I. 1998/1188, S.I. 2003/182, S.I. 2017/881; there are other amending instruments but none is relevant. are amended as follows.
